entities.name: wood
entities.description: The Quidditch team's coach who is angry with Harry for wanting to resign.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A sport played by the students at Hogwarts, which has lost its fun for Harry and his friends.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is ashamed of himself and wants to resign from the Quidditch team.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also suffering due to the situation with the Quidditch team.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Another of Harry's friends who is also being ostracized by the rest of the team.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who, along with Hermione and Harry, keeps to himself and works late into the night.

relationships.description: Wood is the coach of the Quidditch team, which is implied by his reaction to Harry's resignation.
Harry is a member of the Quidditch team and wants to resign from it, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione is Harry's friend who is also suffering due to the situation with the Quidditch team.
Neville is another of Harry's friends who is being ostracized by the rest of the team.
Ron is Harry's friend who, along with Hermione and Harry, keeps to himself and works late into the night.
